image_generation_prompt: A @woman is wearing a white@top, beige high-waisted pants, white sneakers and gold accessories. The @woman stands confidently in a bright, modern bedroom with large windows letting in natural light. She holds a woven clutch in one hand and takes a selfie with her phone in the other. Her gaze is directed towards the phone, capturing her reflection in the mirror. The room features a neatly made bed with a soft throw and a stylish rug on the floor, creating a chic and cozy atmosphere.
